text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, let us go to the "Zen Mediation Experience"!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Unify one's mind and polish up on one's honor roll student style… My excellent idea! I must do my very best!

text_block_list.name: Monk
text_block_list.text: Now, close your eyes and stay quiet. Make no sound, and concentrate…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Roger, close my eyes!! And, stay quiet……quiet………!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Whew… phew… W, what a sense of fatigue. This is what zen meditation, is all about…

text_block_list.name: Zen Meditation Participant
text_block_list.text: Wow～! Thanks to zen meditation, I feel lighter in body and mind～!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: W, what's this!? I'm not quite there yet… you say…!?
Feeling her inexperience, Sakura Bakushin O became depressed…
